attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review:
this app does not load... I can’t access a single thing. How unprofessional as a mother of 7 I feel that I don’t have time for these silly shananagans. I was a supporter but the unprofessionalism has led me somewhere else. BIDEN 2020. 
-starkeisha

attributes.title: Why would anybody get this
attributes.review: Our orange of a president doesn’t want to help of the killings of Black people just for their skin color our president hides in a bunker hopefully this app gets took it down and trumps election fails

attributes.title: i HATE this app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, when i first downloaded it, it shows a picture of Donald Trump with his fist up, the same way they do in BLM protests. why in the world is he mocking them? It is so rude a disgusting, he and his app needa go!

attributes.title: Worse app I’ve seen
attributes.review: I opened the app and I saw this weird orange pedo raising his fist I was extremely confused to why an app would put a man like that in a photo. The app is so slow and doesn’t work well!
No I am not part of the whole gen z thing trying to get this app shut down but I wanted to see what you’re plans were and I didn’t like them so I give this 1 star

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😖
attributes.review: The app kept crashing and every-time I open the app I would get kick out and my screen would turn black. 0/10 would not recommend😒

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: This app is so bad that when I first opened it, my phone blew up in my face and now I have permanently ruined my phone and happiness. Please reconsider putting this into the eyes of the public ever again.

attributes.title: Oh My God
attributes.review: This app is by far the WORST app I have ever had. It took 40 minutes to download to my phone. Then when I finally opened it I saw the most horrendous thing on my screen. Seriously scarring. DO NOT GET THIS APP.....unless??

attributes.title: This App Is a Scam
attributes.review: I don’t understand how this is in the Apple store. It’s faulty coding crashed my phone multiple times after I downloaded it. Once I leave this review I’ll be uninstalling

attributes.title: Terrible awful no good very bad
attributes.review: The colors and the layout are not cute and I am disappointed but not surprised that the “logo” don came up with was simply a T for trump. Where is the flavor? I don’t taste anything.
